jeyathishawedi bi.ee. saman gunasena mahatha wisin pinkamata pamini pirisa piliganima ha aramuna pahadili kaleya anathuruwa nikawaratiya - budumuththawa wiharadhipathi wichithra dharma kathika gaurawa shasthrawedi thambaarakotuwe padmajothi swamin wahanse wisin raswa siti pirisa panchashilayehi pihituwimen pasu nawa arahadi pahan pujawa, aashirwada pujawa ha ganadewi saraswathi puja pawathwa pirisata sethpatha pirith pan ha pirith nul beda dunha awissawella - kolambaa pradhana margayata yabada athuru margaya ha wihara parishraya bauddha kodi ha sudu rediwalin alankara kara than thanwala polthel pahan ha widuli bubulu dalwa aalokawath kara thibini.

e welehi nigantayo budun sitanange geyi di walandanta wadiya yi asa “ada apage bath ketha apawath weyi, ithikin apa katala pas heyi, mahana bhawath gauthamayo aawarthana mayam danithi, unge madhura wu nadayen kiyana bana katha asuwa nam apage bas kanahilange anda kota th sithathi, palamu wa palagos ee sitanan un dakka no dena lesak karamha”yi pansiyayak nighantayo palamuwa diwa awudin sitanan sisara hindagena “api thopata newasikayamha, mahana bhawath gauthamayo thopata aaganthunayo ya, un walandana thanata giya nam niwan manga akul luwa ha sama ya, no yawa”yi ya nudunnahu ya.

peradeniya wishwawidyalaye maha shishya sangamaye sisun pirisak ada (02) mahanuwara nagara madhyaye wirodhathawayak sanwidhanaya kara thibuna.ee mahanuwara, peradeniya saha sirimawo bandaranayaka yana rohalwala sama saukhya waidya pita sisun sandaha sayanika puhunuwa laba dimata pahasukam salasanna yayi rajayata bala karamin.me athara malambae waidya widyalaya sambandhayen rajaya labadun wisadumata wirodhaya pala karamin ada pradesha kihipayaka sathyagraha wyapara sanwidhana kara thibuna.
